title: Executive Order 6125-Public Water Restoration No. 75, Montana, New Mexico, and Wyoming
content: So much of Executive orders of April 28, 1917, creating Public Water Reserve No. 49; of February 8, 1923, creating Public Water Reserve No. 86; and of December 5, 1913, creating Public Water Reserve No. 12, as affects the land hereinafter listed is hereby revoked, and all such land not otherwise reserved or withdrawn is hereby restored to the public domain and shall become subject to disposition under the laws applicable thereto upon such date and after such notice as may be hereafter determined and announced.
Lands affected in Public Water Reserve No. 49:
T. 17 N., R. 29 E., sec. 1, lots 4, 5, and 7.
Lands affected in Public Water Reserve No. 86:
T. 17 S., R. 19 W., sec. 6, E½E½.
Lands affected in Public Water Reserve No. 12:
T. 43 N., R. 68 W., sec. 31, SE¼NE¼
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6125-Public Water Restoration No. 75, Montana, New Mexico, and Wyoming Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361952
